text:
Does anyone know whats wrong with this:
`@reduce expectation[i] := @sum(n) 1/ensemble_size * κ(Θ[:, n], Φ[:, i])`?
`Tensorcast` gives me
```LoadError: don't know what to do with $(Expr(:(:=), :(expectation[i]), :(#= In[37]:7 =# @sum n))) 
    @reduce expectation[i] := #= In[37]:7 =# @sum n  (1 / ensemble_size) * κ(Θ[:, n], Φ[:, i])
in expression starting at In[37]:7```

elements.text:
Does anyone know whats wrong with this:
`@reduce expectation[i] := @sum(n) 1/ensemble_size * κ(Θ[:, n], Φ[:, i])`?

text: I think you have a stray at sign, `@reduce expectation[i] := sum(n) 1/ensemble_size * κ(Θ[:, n], Φ[:, i])` should work

elements.text: I think you have a stray at sign,
@reduce expectation[i] := sum(n) 1/ensemble_size * κ(Θ[:, n], Φ[:, i])

text: Oh man, I'm to tired today, thanks!

elements.text: Oh man, I'm to tired today, thanks!
